name: index.js
description: - CyberNote is a comprehensive online note-taking application designed to provide users with a secure, collaborative, and feature-rich platform for organizing their digital notes. Built on the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), CyberNote aims to redefine the note-taking experience by combining a user-friendly interface with advanced features such as real-time collaboration, robust organization tools, and heightened data security.
